about_the_game:
Escape Academy (Original Soundtrack), is a vivid sprawling collection of the music from Escape Academy, developed by Coin Crew Games, Published by iam8bit & Skybound Games.
Enjoy these eclectic song animals ranging from eerie to funky and back to banger. 47 tracks of electronic, hip hop, and hybrid classical composition for you to absorb and encourage your inner Escape Artist!

Produced & Mixed by doseone
Mastered by Matt "WAKE" Hettich
